text: Exactly what I needed! Open source, no unnecessary junk, and just does the job! Certainly the best auto-quality extension I have used. We truly need more chrome extensions to be open source. Great job, dev!
make it so I can select 1080p Premium please!
Ok.
Minimal and functional...No ads...
Work great! 👍

Thank you so much Sameer 
But, I want to see this beautiful extension on firefox and Safari 
Sincerely
very cool
works and open source :)
If it weren't for the forced new tab that it has updated it would 5/5. It's like, yeah wow, you did something expected. gg. It's stupid and should not happen.
THE BEST!
works perfectly. one thing i would love if it can be added. a second quality option that if the first quality is not available it goes automatically to the second selected quality.
Works great! Highly recommended. Would love it even more if it could ignore High Bitrate mode, otherwise perfect.

Works. To ensure it works you should close chrome and re-open, or open dev tools and remove the cookie named PREF. Then you should right click the refresh button and select "clear cache and hard reset" 

Then it'll work immediately. Otherwise it will take some refreshing and using for it to change quickly.

It require to access data only on youtube.com.

It works!!

Chrome 112.0.5615.140

It works for the most part. You probably won't have any troubles if you select best available quality. There is a problem when you select 1080p though. Sometimes if a video does not have 1080p, then the extension will not automatically set the quality to the next best thing. Instead it will just open the quality menu of the video.
Works! I only just started suffering more severely from YT automatically choosing 360p on a 1440p monitor, no matter the quality of my connection. Thank you.

Sadly doesn't work on Vivaldi Browser which uses Chrome web store / extensions.
handful of errors in console
only opens the settings menu...
It simply does not work. Selected 1080p and non-theatre mode and I got 360p in auto mode.
Doesn't work, it just opening settings panel of video
Does exactly as it says! I was looking for an open source program which did what I wanted and I can just set whatever quality I want my videos without having to think twice!!! Awesome program

There are a lot of these add-ons out there, but this is the only one that i found really works, and i have tried a lot. but this one really does change the picture without messing it up like the others, very good job at coding this one. 

XxFreeLancerxX

Great Extension. Can you please add an option to disable more than 30 fps? 
I have high bandwidth but my browser can't handle high frame rate.
The fact that youtube randomly chooses the default pixelage for you is bonkers. This is the perfect cure and works basically flawlessly for me. Thanks dude, you are the man, I hope youtube hires you!

it's really Simple as name showed, 
there's such a extension like it but what different here is that you can change Quality from youtube it self not forcing you to watch only in Quality you chosen before 
Worked perfectly..
I'm sorry. In my environment, the theater mode adjustment didn't work.
Best and lightest one out there!
Wonderful finding an open-source addon here. <3  Great functionality, does EXACTLY what it's built to do, and nothing extra.  Works flawlessly on Edge Version 95.0.1020.53 (Official build) (64-bit)

I absolutely love this extension, and can not live without it.  It opens the vids in 720p, 1080p, or whatever the users choice is, every time, with easy toggle on and off to open them in theater view.  Never buggy, always loads. Perfect.

it works great when you choose 1080p but once you came across videos that doesn't have HD but for instance its in 360p then the next video stays on 360p even if its in 1080p. If you fix that would be great
Thanks, it work well. and simple to use.
best extension! simple, light and useful. thanks for author
It works perfectly for me (Google Chrome Version 88.0.4324.150)
It works well, loved it!
It does what it says it will do. lol
